mapper.sql: equipid, equipname, icon, position, rank, profession, remark
mapper.insert: insert into game_equip_info (equipid, equipname, icon, position, rank, profession, remark) values (#{equipid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into game_equip_info (equipid, equipname, icon, position, rank, profession, remark) values (#{item.equipid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from game_equip_info where 1=1 and equipid = #{0}
mapper.update: update game_equip_info set equipname = #{equipname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rank = #{rank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and equipid = #{equipid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update game_equip_info
equipname = #{equipname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rank = #{rank, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and equipid = #{equipid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
